name: *  SpinSpanSpun's HandSpun Yarn Club, 13 Months Membership, Customizable
description:
see more samples of my yarn in my etsy shop sold section : spinspanspun.etsy.com

and convo me !
--

If you like my style, why don't you make yourself or a knitter friend this present ?
This is a wonderful gift for yourself or another fiber lover !
When you sign up for the Handspun Yarn Club, you will receive a new skein of wool yarn hand spun by me every month for the duration of your membership.

Every month it will be a totally different skein somewhere between 100 and 250 yards yards, maybe even more depending on my inspiration... I spin all kind of fiber, all of them soft and beautiful !


I'll ship out around the First of each month.

You can customize the club to receive only the type of yarn you love best, or leave it as a total surprise! Take a look at my sold items to get an idea of all the possibilities.

Your monthly yarn will be a surprise. However, if you email me your preferences each month, I will customize the club so you receive just what you want.
And if you have colours that you hate & that you love, type of yarn you'd prefer... just tell me : I'll think of you when I prepare the fibers !

Best of all, you will get a great deal! I always make sure my Yarn Club Members receive special treatment and more for their money.

Choose the appropriate listing for your desired length of time.
3 months: $115
6 months: $195
13 months: $375

This particular listing is for a 13 months subscription. Your yarns will be sent at the beginning of each month. Treat yourself or a friend and enjoy!

name: *  Pure Grey, HandSpun Gotland Single Yarn, Bulky, 80 yards, naturally grey
description:
see more on my etsy shop.

Pure Grey is the simplicity that will enhance the beauty of any other handspun and will allow you to make a larger project.

Pure Grey is a beautiful skein of a very soft and heavy handspun bulky Gotland wool.

I spin Pure Grey up quite regularly in a bulky weight single ply.
I've set the spin.

Bulky: I would knit this yarn on 6.5mm-7.5mm needles but it really depends on your project !

Do not machine wash this yarn. This yarn would felt. Hand wash in lukewarm or cool water; lay flat to dry.

I hand-dye/spin all my yarns one at a time, with care and attention to detail.

I hope you like it !

Laine filee a la main sur mon rouet Little Gem.

name: *  The CAT - Yarn Kit, HandSpun and Hand Dyed Organic Merino Yarn, 2ply, bulky, in Tabby Orange
description:
*

The CAT - Yarn Kit, HandSpun and Hand Dyed Organic Merino Yarn, 2ply, bulky, in Tabby Orange and White

From SpinSpanSpun
The CAT - Yarn Kit, HandSpun and Hand Dyed Organic Merino Yarn, 2ply, bulky, in Tabby Orange and White
zoom
The CAT - Yarn Kit, HandSpun and Hand Dyed Organic Merino Yarn, 2ply, bulky, in Tabby Orange and White The CAT - Yarn Kit, HandSpun and Hand Dyed Organic Merino Yarn, 2ply, bulky, in Tabby Orange and White The CAT - Yarn Kit, HandSpun and Hand Dyed Organic Merino Yarn, 2ply, bulky, in Tabby Orange and White The CAT - Yarn Kit, HandSpun and Hand Dyed Organic Merino Yarn, 2ply, bulky, in Tabby Orange and White
This listing includes all the yarn needed to knit Yarn Miracle's "C is for Cat" pattern in the colors and yarn suggested by the pattern. The pattern can be purchased from yarnmiracle.etsy.com

I will spin and dye yarn for one orange tabby cat with natural, un-dyed hands and feet. The orange will be a mottled (streaky, hand painted looking) so that all of the cat's orange parts (most of him) have interest and are reminiscent of tabby cat stripes. Colors and streaking will vary since this kit is created entirely by hand so each Cat made with this yarn will be unique.

Each kit has 175 incredibly soft yards of bulky organic merino 2 ply and 60 yards undyed 2 ply for the contrast color.
